<img src="http://myrsk.com/v2/img/logos.png" >

MyRSK webhosting solutions has entered the budget vps market since well over a year now (globally). However, we have been providing webhosting solutions since 2009 locally - in Dubai for young entrepreneurs and startup companies. We are currently holding strong with many, many happy clients :-)

<i>Before you jump me with "you said you will not offer budget vps anymore" statements :P

I just would like to say that MyRSK will be offering both managed and unmanaged budget vps solutions, this was in the best interest of our clients, and they deserve all the best :-)</i>

**OpenVZ Czech Republic (Zlin) FDCServers**

4096MB Guaranteed RAM <br>400GB HD <br>4000GB Bandwidth 100mb/s Port <br>FREE Addons Pack (10GB backup space + hosted DNS!) <br>$6.99/month only! <br>[[ORDER](https://myrsk.com/whmcs/cart.php?a=add&pid=109)]

**KVM UK (Coventry) UKServers**

1024MB Guaranteed RAM <br>50GB HD <br>1000GB Bandwidth 100mb/s Port <br>FREE Addons Pack (10GB backup space + hosted DNS!) <br>$6.99/month only! <br>[[ORDER](https://myrsk.com/whmcs/cart.php?a=add&pid=110)]

<br>

We DO NOT allow (not limited to) : Phishing Hacking Port Scanning Prngraphy (of any kind) IRC Bots Spam Proxy Nulled Scripts


Datacenter Information and test files : http://myrsk.com/network.php (if links aren't functioning properly, do understand that some test files have been removed and IPs been renumbered - let us know if you require anything though.)

For queries or support please submit a ticket : http://myrsk.com/whmcs/submitticket.php

Addons: DirectAdmin = $6/month
